```{r message=FALSE}
library(nycflights13)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
# Working with the Flights Data Set
avg_delay <- flights %>%
  filter(arr_delay > 0) %>%
  group_by(origin) %>% 
  summarise(avg_delay_total = mean(arr_delay, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
  ungroup()

plot_ly(avg_delay, type='barpolar', r=~avg_delay_total, theta=~origin, color=~origin) %>%  
  layout(
    title = "2013 NYC Flight Average Arrival Delays",
    polar = list(
      radialaxis = list(title = "Number of Delays"),
      angularaxis = list(categoryarray = flights$origin)
    )
 )
```
